reviews.review: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive to naprawde świetna gra. jeśli masz dobrych teammate'ów. Gra prezentuje wspaniałe community, szczególnie na serwerach wschodnio europejskich, składające się z ruskich takich jak Dimitri, Vlad, Igor oraz wiele innych pogańskich kreatur. Jeśli chcesz grać w tą gre sam, lepiej wyjdź ma dwór pospacerować sobie, naprawde pomoże ci to.

i Had to pay for the game and for the new operation pass, but i've bought the game on two different accounts and played it for over 5 years now. it gets kinda repetative at times but i still come game to play it every now and then. its most definently my favorite game and i think i never will stop playing it
Good game need good teammates. I don’t have the second one.

Overrall a great experience 10/10 would do again
